data.comment: The match has started at Cardiff City Stadium.
Junior Hoilett is on target to give Cardiff a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 4, Great play from Joe Bennett to set up the goal.
Matty James (Barnsley) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Clarke Oduor is on a sub for Elliot Simoes for Barnsley.
In the minute 45, Cardiff have been awarded a penalty in Cardiff...
Dean Whitestone blows to end the first-half.
It's now 2-0 to Cardiff as Joe Ralls scores from the spot.
In the minute 46, Dean Whitestone has blown to start the second-half.
The away team have replaced Patrick Schmidt with Victor Adeboyejo. This is the second substitution made today by Valerien Ismael.
The home team replace Robert Glatzel with Sheyi Ojo.
In the minute 77, Goal! Cardiff extend their lead to 3-0 through Harry Wilson.
Joe Ralls with an assist there.
Gavin Whyte is replacing Harry Wilson for Cardiff at Cardiff City Stadium.
In the minute 80, Valerien Ismael (Barnsley) is making a third substitution, with Aapo Halme replacing Matty James.
Cardiff make their third substitution with Will Vaulks replacing Joe Ralls.
It's 3-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
